message:
I'm trying to move a marker on google maps with a driving route. I managed to animate the marker on the map but I couldn't move it according to a specific route. any help is appreciated thanks in advance.
#Android

data.message: Android. Sorry I forgot to attach that.

I think the closest answer i have right now, is to have a list of positions and start animating to each node and when the animation end,  start animating to the next one.
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/14864664/animating-markers-on-google-maps-v2
Ahmed Emad thanks for the help. The problem is it never goes throw the route it goes form a location to another even if there is a building or any thing it doesn't move according to the route at all.
Mustafa Hammad I'm sorry but can you clarify that please?

I misunderstood what you asked .. I thought that you wanted to remove the marker .. not move it. In addition, I'm experienced in the JS API and your are asking for the Android one. Thus, I removed my comment :)
Mustafa Hammad Thanks any way for responding.

Aya E Mahmoud http://wptrafficanalyzer.in/blog/drawing-driving-route-directions-between-two-locations-using-google-directions-in-google-map-android-api-v2/ 

ahhh! This example illustrate how you could get a driving route and from this point you can get the positions of each marker and then proceed with the first answer i gave to you. However, if you need to give the user the capability to navigate from X to Y while driving, i would advice you to send the longitude and the latitude  to start navigating to the destination ( Using the Google Navigation app). I hope it helps.

hears an API that return A XMLString  the holds the points between 
use them to animate your marker
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/14444228/android-how-to-draw-route-directions-google-maps-api-v2-from-current-location-t

and Hears another one That return A JSON String 
Parse It get you LonLat Points
then animate Your Marker 
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/14702621/answer-draw-path-between-two-points-using-google-maps-android-api-v2
